Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for the Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Seminar - APAC 2017 at {{lead.Option 1 or 2:default=edit me}}. Please save this email for future reference. Event: Honeywell GoDirect Connectivity Seminar - APAC 2017 Location, Date: {{lead.Option 1 or 2:default=edit me}}

Sincerely, Rick WongSales Manager – Pacific | BGA Honeywell | AerospaceMobile: +61 481 902751Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:Rick.Wong@Honeywell.com]]>
